properties.description: Field for non-sorting articles like "A" and "The."
properties.title: Non Sort

properties.description: Title of map.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Date(s) associated with a personal name. Only use official dates as specified in NAF.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: Select a role from the MARC Code List for Relators, e.g., Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the name was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: A term that best describes the type of the image, e.g., Maps, Road Maps.
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: An excellent source for terms is the Thesaurus for Graphic Materials from the Library of Congress.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Record the date in a human-readable form, following DACS section 2.4.
properties.title: Date issued (human-readable)

properties.description: Use this date field if the exact date (whether year, month, and day; year and month; or even just the exact year) is known. Record in YYYY-MM-DD format.
properties.title: Exact date issued

properties.description: Use with date that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Approximate dates. Record as a range between two years (e.g., for circa 1950s, record 1950-1959. For circa 1953, record 1953-1953). Put the first year in the range (e.g., 1950 for c. 1950s or 1953 for c. 1953) in this field.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Put the last year in the range (e.g., 1959 for circa 1950s or 1953 for circa 1953) in this field.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Record the date in a human-readable form, following DACS section 2.4.
properties.title: Date created (human-readable)

properties.description: Use this date field if the exact date (whether year, month, and day; year and month; or even just the exact year) is known. Record in YYYY-MM-DD format.
properties.title: Exact date created

properties.description: Use with date that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Approximate dates. Record as a range between two years (e.g., for circa 1950s, record 1950-1959. For circa 1953, record 1953-1953). Put the first year in the range (e.g., 1950 for c. 1950s or 1953 for c. 1953) in this field.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Put the last year in the range (e.g., 1959 for circa 1950s or 1953 for circa 1953) in this field.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: A place associated with the issuing, publication, release, distribution, manufacture, production, or origin of a resource.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Input cartographic information for a single map. Click the Add button for additional maps.
Contains a statement of the scale at which the map is drawn, e.g., Scale [ca. 1:39,600].
properties.title: Scale

properties.description: Contains a statement of the geographic coordinates covered by the resource, e.g., W 122°23§--W 121°28§/N 37°55§--N 37°27§.
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: Input a single term in the appropriate field. Click the Add button for additional terms.
Date(s) associated with a personal name. Only use official dates as specified in NAF.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: Information about restrictions imposed on access to a resource.
properties.title: Access Condition

properties.default_value: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Director of Library and Archives. Consent is given on behalf of the California Historical Society as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner. Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes. Responsibility for any use, including copying, transmitting, or making any other use of protected images, rests exclusively with the user. Upon request, digitized works can be removed from public view if there are rights issues that need to be resolved.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

properties.description: General textual information relating to a resource.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Input a single related item in the appropriate fields. Click the Add button for additional items.
The institution or repository that holds the resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical location

properties.description: The URL or PURL of the resource.
properties.title: URL
